LanguageData.Apparel_CowboyHat.label: Duellist's Hat
LanguageData.Apparel_CowboyHat.description: A well decorated, brimmed hat. A cowboy would want this.
LanguageData.Apparel_Kufiya.label: 包头巾
LanguageData.Apparel_Kufiya.description: A kufiya is a type of square scarf often wrapped around the face and neck. It is commonly used in arid regions as it provides protection from sunburn, dust and sand.
LanguageData.Apparello_wassupcap.label: 双角帽
LanguageData.Apparello_wassupcap.description: An awe inspiring hat. Similar to that of a king with a crown, only captains who have a bicorne are acknowledged as the real deal.
LanguageData.Apparel_BowlerHat.label: Hard Hat
LanguageData.Apparel_BowlerHat.description: Favoured by the construction workers all across the galaxy. These are known to have saved lives of many who fell prey to the infamous falling lunchbox, hammer or brick.
LanguageData.Apparello_Chefhat.label: 厨师帽
LanguageData.Apparello_Chefhat.description: These iconic chef hats do serve an actual purpose - keeping the hair in check. Finding hair in your soup often means dissatisfied customer.
LanguageData.Apparello_Commissar.label: 鸭舌帽
LanguageData.Apparello_Commissar.description: Often seen on military officers, these indigenous alpha mammals of the battlefields tend to be so amazing that their skills rub off on their clothes.
LanguageData.Apparello_Tricorn.label: 三角帽
LanguageData.Apparello_Tricorn.description: The tricorn is long out of fashion. Why anyone would still wear these is strange. Still, they are comfortable to wear.
LanguageData.Apparello_Sombrero.label: 宽边帽
LanguageData.Apparello_Sombrero.description: Keeps the sun off your eyes during siesta! Ay caramba!
LanguageData.Apparello_Cardshark.label: 老千帽
LanguageData.Apparello_Cardshark.description: Stylish, elegant and soft to the touch. Known as the most important part of western attire, especially amongst the card cheats and other slippery individuals.
LanguageData.Winter_RHEF.label: 俄式冬帽
LanguageData.Winter_RHEF.description: A Russian winter hat with ear flaps. It can keep your head warm during the coldest of winters.
LanguageData.Winter_Cap.label: 冬帽
LanguageData.Winter_Cap.description: A snug, fitted winter-worthy cap to keep your head warm in the harsh cold.
